predicate.note: Frames file for 'reschedule' based on remapping the frames file for 'schedule'.

roleset.name: plan a time, again
roleset.note: The arg3 "time of event" is entirely separate from the time of scheduling which will take an argM-TMP.

example.name: active
example.text: Nissan rescheduled a seven-yen interim dividend payment, unchanged.
example.arg: a seven-yen interim dividend payment, unchanged

example.name: passivized and extracted
example.text: ...the first of five small fields rescheduled *trace* to be brought into production before the end of 1990.
example.arg: to be brought into production before the end of 1990

example.name: passivized, temporal
example.text: A guild disciplinary hearing is rescheduled *trace* next Monday in New York

example.name: apparent temporal--but not!
example.text: ...the multilevel railcars, rescheduled *trace* for delivery in 1990...

roleset.note: Because the phrase "for delivery in 1990" includes an action, not just a time, it counts as an arg2 not an arg3.

example.name: contrasting temporals
example.text: Today John rescheduled a dentist appointment for next week.
